note: Here for the craic. Beer, bread and butter, will finally see me shuffling off this mortal coil, but I can't resist the tempatation.  Journalist.  A fully paid-up member of the NUJ.  Trade union activist.  Anarchist (still at my age), and an antifascist.  Family guy.  Despite my appearance, not a grizzly grampa.  Love my dogs and books, too.  Game of Thrones TV fan (though not the ending ... fans will know).
